message_1: Given the Vigenere cipher with the keyword "MATH", encrypt the plaintext message "FIBONACCI" and provide the resulting ciphertext.
message_2:
To encrypt the plaintext message "FIBONACCI" using the Vigenère cipher with the keyword "MATH", we first need to repeat the keyword to match the length of the plaintext message:

Plaintext:  F I B O N A C C I
Keyword:    M A T H M A T H M A

Now, we use the Vigenère square (or tabula recta) to find the corresponding ciphertext letter for each plaintext letter using the keyword letter as the row and the plaintext letter as the column.

F (row M) -> R
I (row A) -> I
B (row T) -> U
O (row H) -> W
N (row M) -> Z
A (row A) -> A
C (row T) -> O
C (row H) -> Q
I (row M) -> Q

The resulting ciphertext is: "RIUWZAQOQ".
